metadata.title: CVE-2020-17541 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - low
metadata.description:
Libjpeg-turbo all version have a stack-based buffer overflow in the"transform" component. A remote attacker can send a malformed jpeg file tothe service and cause arbitrary code execution or denial of service of thetarget service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-17541` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjpeg-turbo-progs - 2.0.3-0ubuntu1.20.04.3
libjpeg-turbo-test - 2.0.3-0ubuntu1.20.04.3
libjpeg-turbo8 - 2.0.3-0ubuntu1.20.04.3
libturbojpeg - 2.0.3-0ubuntu1.20.04.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libjpeg-turbo package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.0.3-0ubuntu1.20.04.3').
